description: This file is the main root layout component for a Remix-run-based React frontend for a virtual meeting scheduler. It imports Remix-specific components for links, metadata, scripts, and routing, and defines the overall HTML structure of the app, including head metadata and body content.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links for preconnects and stylesheet for fonts.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Provides metadata for the page, including title and description.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: A React component that wraps children with HTML structure, including head elements and body layout.

methods.name: App
methods.description: The default React component that renders the Outlet for nested routes.
